analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/40/0xeb88d06a648fbac1482b7e57560aaab2a78a0ec9.sol:
	Contract DollarX has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb88d06a648fbac1482b7e57560aaab2a78a0ec9.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb88d06a648fbac1482b7e57560aaab2a78a0ec9.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
